summary: Makes Onmund look less ridiculous when he removes his hood... Replaces the nappy hair and removes the neanderthal chin.
descriptionHtml:
Ever thought Onmund looked pretty normal?  Then you gave him that enchanted piece of headgear and he scared the crap out of you when he took his hood off?  If so, then this mod is for you! ;)

The first of what will probably be many mods in the Skyrim Facial Reconstruction project... bringing free polygonal surgery to the NPCs that really, REALLY need it.

Onmund 1.0 removes the nappy hair, and trims the neanderthal chin down so he looks less like a  human/grouper-fish hybrid.  ;)

Created with Skyrim NPC editor - thanks so much foretrenty for this awesome tool!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554
author: JB
